thread.section_title: Staybridge Suites London - Vauxhall - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Simply the best
thread.title_full: Simply the best - Review of Staybridge Suites London - Vauxhall, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Danielle W
title: Simply the best
text: We really enjoyed our stay here. It is a 10 minute walk to Vauxhall metro, just walk towards the embankment. There is a phone you can use during your stay with data and it calls to the US. The TV is essentially a Roku player. Laundry is free and there are plenty of machines. The Rose pub around the corner is very nice to eat dinner. What more can I say? We will be back!
